RPC.RQUOTAD(8) System Manager's Manual RPC.RQUOTAD(8)

NAME

rpc.rquotad, rquotad — remote quota server

SYNOPSIS

/usr/libexec/rpc.rquotad

DESCRIPTION

rpc.rquotad is an rpc(3) server which returns quotas for a user of a local filesystem which is NFS-mounted onto a remote machine. Typically, quota(1) uses the results to display user quotas for remote filesystems. rpc.rquotad is normally invoked via launchd by the NFS server - nfsd(8). The port that the service is made available on can be specified using the nfs.server.rquota.port option in nfs.conf(5).

rpc.rquotad uses an RPC protocol defined in /usr/include/rpcsvc/rquota.x.

SEE ALSO

quota(1), nfsd(8), nfs.conf(5)

June 11, 2007 macOS 14.6
